sentences.en: Friends, what do you feel when you hear of such heroism?
sentences.cn: 朋友们, 当你听到这段英雄事迹的时候,你的感想如何 呢 ?

sentences.en: Gerty paused and added with a flash of heroism.
sentences.cn: 葛泰停顿一下,然后鼓起勇气说道.

sentences.en: He received a medal for his heroism.
sentences.cn: 他由于英勇而获得一枚奖章.

sentences.en: Heroism, and noise, and fashion are all against him.
sentences.cn: 英雄主义 、 轰轰烈烈 、 衣着入时都与他无缘.
他的行动是真正的英雄行为.

sentences.en: His conduct, bravery, heroism is beyond praise.
sentences.cn: 他的行为 、 勇敢和侠义非口舌所能赞誉.
他的勇敢行为应该得到我们的赞美.
他的英勇是赞美不尽的.

sentences.en: On Sept. 11, all three kinds of heroism came to light.
sentences.cn: 在9月11日, 3种类型的英雄主义行为都有所体现.

sentences.en: President Roosevelt was mighty proud when he awarded the Navy Cross for heroism to his son.
sentences.cn: 罗斯福总统因他儿子的英雄行为而授给他海军十字勋章,总统为此感到十分骄傲.

sentences.en: Self - trust is the essence of heroism.
sentences.cn: 自信 为英雄气概之本.

sentences.en: Stories of his heroism resounded through the country.
sentences.cn: 他的英雄故事传遍全国.

sentences.en: The world is full of such heroism.
sentences.cn: 这个世界上充满了这类英勇事迹.

sentences.en: Then he remembers his deeds of heroism.
sentences.cn: 他马上又记起了自己的英雄行为.

sentences.en: This is an act of great heroism.
sentences.cn: 这是一种了不起的英勇行为.

words.tran_cn: 英雄的；英勇的；记叙英雄及其事迹的；夸张的
英勇，英雄气概；英雄行为；勇敢的事迹

trans.tran_cn: 英雄行为，英勇精神，英雄气概，英雄品质，英雄主义，勇敢的事迹
trans.tran_en: Heroism is great courage and bravery
